headline: How Hormel Foods, Hershey, And Horace Mann Educators Can Put Cash In Your Pocket
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. Hormel Foods, Hershey, and Horace Mann Educators have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. These companies currently offer dividend yields of over 3%.
